titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that the current property tax deduction on private residences should not be further restricted.
Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that the current property tax deduction on private residences should not be further restricted.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that the current tax deduction for property taxes should not be further restricted.
